releases.title: v0.49.0
releases.description:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.49.0 -->

## What's Changed
### Enhancements 🔥
* Support fish when running shell command by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4350
* Add acme editor preset by @rakoo in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4360
* Support home and end as alternatives to '<' and '>' by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4396
* Drop the git config cache when getting focus by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4376
* Add a "Content of selected file" entry to the copy menu for commit files by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4341
* Add root node in file tree by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4346
* [FEAT] Add Recursive Bulk Initialize and Update for Submodules by @cesarandr in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4259
* Commit without pre-commit hooks action is independent on prefix by @kschweiger in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4374
* Let users define custom icons and color for files on the config file by @hasecilu in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4395
* Add "Absolute path" item to the file view's copy menu by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4410
* Allow range drop stashes by @gaogao-qwq in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4451
* More navigation keybindings for confirmation panel by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4404
* Resolve non-inline merge conflicts by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4431
* Add `runCommand` function to Go template syntax + add support for templates in git `branchPrefix` setting by @ruudk in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4438
* Show "(hooks disabled)" in title bar of commit message editor by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4467
* Add a command to select all commits of the current branch by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4448
### Fixes 🔧
* Use a waiting status for rewording a non-head commit by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4343
* Fix layout of options view for non-english languages by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4359
* Fix changing language while lazygit is running by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4361
* URL encode gitlab brackets to make consistent with branch names by @ChrisMcD1 in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4336
* Fix commitPrefix setting with empty pattern by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4381
* Commit only tracked files in tracked filter view by @parthokunda in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4386
* Revert #4313 (Skip post-checkout hook when discarding changes) by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4407
* Enhance support for GPG signed tags by @ChrisMcD1 in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4394
* Fix checking out a file from a range selection of commits by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4423
* Fix discarding submodule changes in nested folders by @brandondong in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4317
* Better support for shell aliases by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4385
* Fix hyperlinks in last line of confirmation popups by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4454
* Fix wrong main view content after pressing `e` in a stack of branches by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4450
* fix: update vscode color to logo color by @PeterCardenas in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4459
* Fix crash with drag selecting and staging by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4480
* Escape special characters in filenames when git-ignoring files by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4475
### Maintenance ⚙️
* Fix linter warnings by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4352
* Fix release schedule again by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4364
* Update to go 1.24 by @radsaq in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4377
* Add an integration test for a config with a negative refspec by @radsaq in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4382
* Specify a go release minor version by @radsaq in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4393
* Fix flaky integration test by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4432
* Some code cleanup by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4449
* Bump the minimum required git version to 2.22 by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4439
* Bump go-git, and get rid of github.com/imdario/mergo by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4460
* Skip date check when release worfklow is manually invoked by @jesseduffield in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4484
### Docs 📖
* Include empty arrays and maps in config docs by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4413
* Filter out deprecated user config fields from generated Config.md by @karimkhaleel in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4416
* Corrected interactive rebase keybind example in README.md by @NewtonChutney in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4426
* Update kidpix link in README to active url by @ChrisMcD1 in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4425
### I18n 🌎
* Update translation files from Crowdin by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4473
